ogTitle: 18.07.19 nassar victims at espys - smarther news

card_1.cardText:
> **aThe ripple effect of our actions, or inactions, can be enormous, spanning generations. Perhaps the greatest tragedy of this nightmare is that it could have been avoided. Predators thrive in silence.”**
> 
> Olympic gymnast Aly Raisman, accepting the Arthur Ashe Courage Award at the 2018 ESPY Awards alongside 100+ of Larry Nassar's sexual abuse victims and her 'sister survivors.'

[Watch Now](https://www.youtube.com/embed/W9hu5HLoSzM?enablejsapi=1&autoplay=1&rel=0)

body:
• ‘Sister survivors’ moment of solidarity accepting Arthur Ashe Courage Award | ESPYS 2018 | ESPN:
    https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W9hu5HLoSzM
